statements: SELECT * FROM user_authentication;
SELECT username, email FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM user_authentication WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_authentication WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, last_login FROM user_authentication WHERE last_login >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'admin' AND password_hash = 'hashedpassword';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_authentication WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, account_number FROM payment_accounts WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users INNER JOIN payment_accounts ON users.user_id = payment_accounts.user_id;
SELECT username, account_number, cvv FROM users JOIN payment_accounts ON users.user_id = payment_accounts.user_id WHERE account_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM payment_accounts WHERE cvv = 123;
SELECT account_number, expiry_date FROM payment_accounts WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, account_number FROM users JOIN payment_accounts ON users.user_id = payment_accounts.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'example';
SELECT user_id, bank_name, account_number FROM payment_accounts WHERE bank_name = 'Example Bank';
SELECT * FROM login_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, bank_name FROM payment_accounts ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM login_attempts WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT account_id, user_id, bank_name, account_number FROM payment_accounts INNER JOIN users ON payment_accounts.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(session_id) AS total_sessions FROM sessions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(session_id) > 1;
SELECT user_id, MAX(start_time) AS latest_session FROM sessions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sessions FROM sessions WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT user_id, username, start_time, end_time, role_name FROM users JOIN sessions ON users.user_id = sessions.user_id JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payments GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE password_hash = 'abc123';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_roles FROM user_roles GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_roles > 2;
